naslov: Jedinstvena vila s čarobnim pogledom na more, Split - Omiš (prodaja)
opis: Na pola puta između Splita i Omiša, na idiličnoj lokaciji na 250m nadmorske visine. Jugozapadne orijentacije s nestvarnim pogledom na Srednjodalmatinske otoke. Vila se nalazi na čestici veličine 1848m2, koja je parcelizirana na: - 856m2 na kojoj se nalazi vila - građevinska čestica 992m2 pravilog oblika, uključena u cijenu, posljednja u građevnoj zoni s mogučnosti izgradnje još jedne vile ili popratnih sadržaja kao što su teniski teren, spa, wellness, teretana ili pak ostaje mogućnost uživanja u 50 stabala maslina Vila je 213m2 bruto površine, sastoji se od: - grijanog bazena s elektrolizom, jacuzzi i sunčalište - natkrivena terasa s ljetnom kuhinjom, roštiljem, vanjskim blagavaonskim stolom, dva vrta i skladišta - prizemlje se sastoji od prostranog dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom, loggia, wc s ostavom - na katu se nalaze četiri spavače sobe s vlastitim kupaonicama ***Prodaje direktno vlasnik.*** ———————————————————————— Stunning Villa Between Split and Omiš – Panoramic Sea Views & Expansion Potential Nestled halfway between Split and Omiš, this exceptional villa is set in an idyllic location at 250 meters above sea level. With a southwest orientation, it offers breathtaking, unobstructed views of the Central Dalmatian islands. Property Overview: The villa sits on a spacious 1,848 m² plot, divided as follows: • 856 m² – occupied by the main villa • 992 m² – a separate, regular-shaped building plot included in the price, located at the edge of the construction zone. It offers the opportunity to build a second villa or additional amenities such as a tennis court, spa, wellness area, gym—or simply enjoy the natural beauty of 50 mature olive trees. Villa Specifications: Total gross area: 213 m² Outdoor Features: • Heated swimming pool with electrolysis system • Jacuzzi and sunbathing deck • Covered terrace with a fully equipped summer kitchen and barbecue • Outdoor dining area, two landscaped gardens, and storage rooms Interior Layout: • Ground Floor: Spacious open-plan living room and kitchen, loggia, guest WC with storage • First Floor: Four elegant bedrooms, each with a private en-suite bathroom ***Selling directly by owners.***
